## Description
        A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

  - type: input
    id: steps-to-reproduce
    attributes:
      label: Steps to reproduce
      placeholder: "List the steps to reproduce the bug"
      description: "Please provide a minimal set of steps to reproduce the issue."

  - type: input
    id: expected-behavior
    attributes:
      label: Expected behavior
      placeholder: "What you expected to happen"

  - type: input
    id: actual-behavior
    attributes:
      label: Actual behavior
      placeholder: "What actually happened"

  - type: input
    id: environment
    attributes:
      label: Environment
      placeholder: "Please specify the environment (e.g., OS, Python version, etc.)"

  - type: input
    id: additional-context
    attributes:
      label: Additional context
      placeholder: "Any other context or information that might be helpful"
